Text.content: In the traditional workplace's explorer view you can take full advantage of all the extra features. For example, various (XML) files can be edited with the content editor, historic versions of files can be compared, etc. As a drawback of the workplace's explorer view, you cannot stick to your usual development environment, e.g., your favorite editor. To overcome this drawback, you can also mount the VFS to the real file system, but you may lose some of the "special features". See here for details.
